speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is him. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi Mr. Thompson, this is Lisa from XYZ Collections. I'm reaching out regarding a balance on your account. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your identity. You have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I’d like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Certainly, I can assist you with that. How much would you like to pay each month?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I’ll set that up for you. You will start your payments next month.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Mr. Thompson. Have a great day!
